about_the_game:
This DLC unlocks content that will become available around 10 to 15 hours into the game, according to individual speed and completion rate of side quests.
The DLC content is optional, not required to enjoy Questlist and not the focus of the game.

  • The girls won't wear any swimsuits during their trip to the lake!
  • Using the rose-tinted glasses on Celia's route will show a different scene!

This DLC will unlock two fully voiced, adults-only scenes for each route! The scenes will be available once Vera and her beloved make their relationship official.
This will happen many hours into the game, according to individual speed and completion rate of the side content.

  • Téa's route features shibari ♡
  • Reniel's scenes are softer and focus on her first time ♡
  • Sunny gets spicy with cosplay and crazy brews ♡
  • Celia is all about sensuality with two very special massages ♡
Please note that Lyra's route does not feature any scenes between Vera and Lyra.
Instead, this DLC will extend the scene between Téa and Sunny present in her route ♡

content_descriptors.notes:
This DLC adds optional adult only content to 'After I met that catgirl, my questlist got too long!'.
All the scenes are between consensual women.
Kinks included are: naturism, shibari, frottage, cunnilingus, first time, cosplay sex, dom/sub, temporary penile acquisition, penetrative sex, nuru massage, foodplay.

The DLC content is optional, not required to enjoy Questlist and not the focus of the game.

  • The girls won't wear any swimsuits during their trip to the lake!

This DLC will unlock two fully voiced, adults-only scenes for each route! The scenes will be available once Vera and her beloved make their relationship official.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL capable GPU
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Delve deep into the nights Vera shares with her beloved! This DLC adds optional adults-only scenes to Questlist.
